wikipedia_page.main: Sir Reginald James Neville Neville, 1st Baronet (22 February 1863 – 28 April 1950), born Reginald Neville White, was a British barrister and Conservative and Unionist Member of Parliament. He was created a baronet in 1927.

response: *Sir Reginald Neville, 1st Baronet (1863–1950), barrister and politician
